statements: SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_login WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_login WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_login WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' AND last_login > '2021-06-01';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_login WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_login WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_login ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_login;
SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' OR username LIKE '%root%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT roles.role_name, users.username FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id JOIN users ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY role_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT session_id, session_token, session_expires FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT sessions.session_id, sessions.user_id, users.username FROM sessions INNER JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM user_profile
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_session
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name IN ('admin', 'moderator');
